Create a customizable cereal box that allows customers to choose their own. This could include a variety of toppings and flavors that can be added to the cereal box before it is shipped to the customer.
Design a cereal box that doubles as a portable speaker. This could be done by incorporating-powered speakers into the design of the cereal box.
Create a cereal box that is designed to be used as a planter. This could be done by incorporating a small planter into the design of the cereal box, and including seeds or a small plant in the box.
Design a cereal box that is designed to be used as a first aid kit. This could be done by including items such as band-aids, antiseptic wipes, and other medical supplies in the cereal box.

Create a cereal box that is designed to be used as a portable charging station. This could be done by incorporating a charging port into the design of the cereal box, and including a battery pack in the box.
